generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface in the foreground and extending into the background is a road, as it is the surface on which vehicles, including the visible car, are driven.
- sidewalk: The paved area to the right of the road, where pedestrians are walking, is a sidewalk, as it is designated for pedestrians and is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: The large structure with the "DEICHMANN" sign and glass windows is a building, as it is a constructed structure with commercial signage.
- vegetation: The trees with visible foliage on the right side of the image are vegetation.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk to the right, and another person is visible near the parked car on the left, all fitting the definition of person.
- car: A white Mini Cooper is visible parked on the left side of the road, fitting the definition of car.
- motorcycle: A red scooter is parked near the building entrance, fitting the definition of motorcycle.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign, a "No Entry" sign, and a triangular warning sign with an exclamation mark, all of which are traffic signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic signs and the street lamp, fitting the definition of pole.
